about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Ara: History Untold with the game’s soundtrack. This complete soundtrack includes over 100 original compositions, with hours of music that evolves over time from The Ancient Era to The Future Age. The soundtrack is available in a wide variety of formats including High Quality Stereo MP3.

This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Premium Edition.
